`status`=#{value} AND

SELECT `date`, SUM(total) as total,uid FROM t_read_recoder GROUP BY `date` HAVING `date`>=#{beginTime} AND #{endTime} >= `date` AND #{uid} ORDER BY `date` DESC

SELECT IFNULL(b.total,0) AS total FROM (SELECT #{endTime} AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(#{endTime}, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(#{endTime}, INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(#{endTime}, INTERVAL 3 DAY) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(#{endTime}, INTERVAL 4 DAY) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(#{endTime}, INTERVAL 5 DAY) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(#{endTime}, INTERVAL 6 DAY) AS click_date ) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT `date`,uid, SUM(total) AS total FROM t_read_recoder GROUP BY `date` HAVING uid=#{uid} ) b
ON a.click_date=b.date ORDER BY a.click_date ASC

SELECT t.total AS total FROM (SELECT SUM(total) AS total,DATE_FORMAT(`date`,'%Y-%m') AS `date`,uid FROM t_read_recoder GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(`date`,'%Y-%m') HAVING `date`>=#{beginTime} AND #{endTime} >= `date` AND uid=#{uid} ) t
SELECT r.`title` AS title,r.`num` AS num,r.`id` AS id FROM t_article r INNER JOIN t_article_category c ON r.`cid`=c.`id` AND c.`parent_id` =#{value} AND r.`status`=2 ORDER BY r.`num` DESC LIMIT 0,8
SELECT support_num FROM t_article_expan WHERE aid=#{value}
